title: Lambs carcass composition
text: tutorial explain use pasagropasr R package developed accommodate datasets resulted reseach activities PAS-AGRO-PAS project. first step load pasagropasr, packages need data analysis.

title: Lambs carcass composition
text: conduct statistical analyses, need import data R working environment. predmicror package incorporated datasets, can use data() function load example datasets working environment. Thus, start fitting full growth model experimental data, thus load lambs.rda dataset part predmicror package. Now dataset available R environment, can print entire dataset typing lambBreeds take look first five lines using head(). data outer predmicrorpackage, usually .csv format, flat text files use read.csv() function import CSV file R environment. load dataset, good practice assure dataset located working directory, thus import CSV file called growthfull.csv R environment next code section. dataset R environment, thus can start checking data proprieties. example, str() function gives information considering structure variables (numeric, integer, etc.), names() function show us variables names.

title: Lambs carcass composition
text: check relationship Time lnN, might use function plot(), can check data visual inspection.
code: plot(MUS ~ KKCF,   data = lambBreeds,   xlab = "%", ylab = "%" )

title: Authors and Citation
text: Vasco Cadavez. Author, maintainer. Ursula Gonzales-Barron. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Cadavez V, Gonzales-Barron U (2024). pasagropasr: Data sets PAS-AGRO-PAS Project. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/PAS-AGRO-PAS/pasagropasr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {pasagropasr: Data sets from PAS-AGRO-PAS Project},   author = {Vasco Cadavez and Ursula Gonzales-Barron},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/PAS-AGRO-PAS/pasagropasr/}, }

title: PAS-AGRO-PAS
text: pasagropasr package provides collection datasets generated research activities PAS-AGRO-PAS project. datasets result collaborative work PAS-AGRO-PAS partners. primary aim package make datasets accessible research community, serving valuable resource training young researchers supporting studies agriculture environmental sciences.

title: PAS-AGRO-PAS
text: can install latest stable version package CRAN (available) development version GitHub.
code: # Install devtools package if not already installed install.packages("devtools")  # Install the latest development version from GitHub devtools::install_github("PAS-AGRO-PAS/pasagropasr")

title: PAS-AGRO-PAS
text: package currently includes following dataset: Additional datasets may added future versions enhance package’s utility agricultural environmental research.

title: PAS-AGRO-PAS
text: Follow steps get started pasagropasr package: Install package using CRAN GitHub. Load package using library(pasagropasr). Load dataset using data() function. example:

title: PAS-AGRO-PAS
text: example box plot showing muscle content percentage breed lambBreeds dataset:
code: library(ggplot2)  lambBreeds |>   ggplot() +   geom_boxplot(     aes(x = MUS, y = Breed),      colour = "#102C68",      fill = "#7AD151"   ) +   theme_bw() +   labs(     x = "Muscle content (%)",      y = "Breed"   )

title: PAS-AGRO-PAS
text: pasagropasr requires R version 3.5 higher. Additional suggested packages extended functionality include: ggplot2 visualization. readxl reading Excel files. tidyverse data manipulation visualization workflows.

title: PAS-AGRO-PAS
text: package licensed GNU General Public License (GPL-3). means free use, modify, distribute software, provided derivative works also remain open source license.

what: Lambs carcass measurements and tissues proportion — lambBreeds
title: Lambs carcass measurements and tissues proportion — lambBreeds
text: dataset lambBreeds contains information  40 male lambs (22 Churra Galega Bragançana (CGB) breed 18 Suffolk (SU) breed), carcass dimension measurements, tissues depth measurements, longissimus muscle area, breast bone tissue thickness, carcass composition.

title: Lambs carcass measurements and tissues proportion — lambBreeds
Lambs carcass measurements and tissues proportion — lambBreeds
text: data frame 40 rows (lambs) 25 columns (variables): Lamb Lamb identification number Breed Breed lamb: 22 Churra Galega Bragançana breed (CGB) 18 Suffolk breed (SFK) HCW Hot carcass weight (Kg) obtained imediatly slaugther F Leg length (mm) - smallest distance perineum interior face tarsal-metatarsal articular surface K Carcass length (mm) - measured de base tail base neck G Width buttocks (mm) - width measured using measuring calliper level proximal edge patellae U Circumference thorax (mm) - circumference measured using tape held horizontally around thorax level caudal portion scapula CB Circumference buttock (mm) - circumference measured using tape held horizontally around buttocks level caudal insertion C1 Subcutaneous fat thickness (mm) 1st-2nd lumbar vertebrae C3 Subcutaneous fat thickness (mm) 3rd-4th lumbar vertebrae C12 Subcutaneous fat thickness (mm) 12th-13th ribs BT2 Total breast bone tissue thickness (mm) measured middle 2nd sternebrae BT3 Total breast bone tissue thickness (mm) measured middle 3rd sternebrae BT4 Total breast bone tissue thickness (mm) measured middle 4th sternebrae B1 Longissimus muscle depth (mm) measured 1st-2nd lumbar vertebrae B3 Longissimus muscle depth (mm) measured 3rd-4th lumbar vertebrae B12 Longissimus muscle depth (mm) measured 12-13th ribs LEA1 Longissimus muscle area (\(cm^2\)) measured 1st-2nd lumbar vertebrae LEA3 Longissimus muscle area (\(cm^2\)) measured 3rd-4th lumbar vertebrae LEA12 Longissimus muscle area (\(cm^2\)) measured 12-13th ribs MUS Carcass muscle proportion (%) SF Carcass subcutaneous fat proportion (%) Carcass intermuscular fat proportion (%) BO Carcass bone proportion (%) KKCF Kidney-knob channel fat proportion (%)

title: Lambs carcass measurements and tissues proportion — lambBreeds
text: CadavezMSci2012pasagropasr

title: Lambs carcass measurements and tissues proportion — lambBreeds
text: Vasco Cadavez vcadavez@ipb.pt

title: Lambs carcass measurements and tissues proportion — lambBreeds
Version 0.1.0 (Initial Development Version)
text: Initial conceptualization development pasagropasr package. Established package structure basic functionality. Added lambBreeds dataset proof concept. Laid groundwork future dataset additions enhancements. Basic README documentation created.

what: Stay tuned for upcoming updates and new features in future releases!
title: Version 0.1.0 (Initial Development Version)
text: latest development version, visit GitHub repository: https://github.com/PAS-AGRO-PAS/pasagropasr/
